item.title: Html Decoder
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 在线解码 http://www.ofmonkey.com/encode/unicode html-decoder 包的使用 install 1 2 3 4 [jlch@check gen]$ sudo npm install -g html-decoder [jlch@check gen]$ cd /usr/local/lib/node_modules/html-decoder/ [jlch@check html-decoder]$ ls bin data dist Gruntfile.js LICENSE package.json README.md src tests 测试 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 [jlch@check html-decoder]$ sudo vi data/entities.json ## 把想decoder的内容放进去 [jlch@check
